puzzle.title: Jerseys
puzzle.hint: Have you searched for bike jerseys?
Have you tried using the first letters?
Move clockwise from the top starting at 'R' and 'T'
The text is RIDE TO NORTHEAST TENTH AND ALBERTA
The location is the BYE AND BYE
puzzle.solution: We do not currently have this solution in our archives.
